enableInstallation.title: Show installation actions
enableInstallation.description: Enable actions needed to activate software installations using LOB licenses

enableIssuerActions.title: Issuer Actions
enableIssuerActions.description: Enable actions to issue new licenses using LOB

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language the LOB wallet shall be in

hover.borrowedBalance: Licenses given to you that may be reclaimed by the original owner

transferDescription.licenses_not_transferred: The licenses have not been transferred on yet.
transferDescription.licenses_completely_transferred: The licenses have all been transferred to %s.
transferDescription.licenses_completely_transferred_indirect: The licenses have been completely transferred to you, but these transfers may have been partially indirect (with other intermediate owners).
transferDescription.licenses_partially_transferred_indirectl: %s licenses have been transferred to you, but these transfers may have been partially indirect (with other intermediate owners).
transferDescription.no_owned_licenses: You do not currently own any licenses of this issuing.

licenseCertificate.certificate_signed: This certificate has been signed using the SSL certificate with public key fingerprint %s.

licenseInfo.intro: %s has issued the following license under this LOB license contract:

error.no_license_selected: You need to select a license to reclaim
error.from_not_valid: This is not a valid ethereum address
error.amount_not_specified: You need to specify how many licenses to reclaim
error.amount_less_than_balance: You can only reclaim %s licenses from the selected account
error.amount_zero: You need to reclaim at least one license

transfer.destroyLink: If you wish to destroy a license click here.

error.recipient_equal_to_sender: The recipient must be different from the sender address
error.no_issuance_selected: You must select an issuance to transfer
error.no_amount_specified: You must specify how many licenses you want to transfer
error.amount_zero: You need to transfer at least one license
error.amount_less_than_balance: You cannot transfer more licenses than you own

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: The license contract under which licenses shall be revoked

error.no_licenseContract_selected: You need to select a license contract under which licenses shall be revoked
error.no_issuanceID_selected: You need to select a license to revoke

rootContract.title: Root Contract
rootContract.description: The root contract you choose to create your license contract under defines the legal framework of your license issuings

issuerName.title: Issuer Name
issuerName.description: The name of the person or organisation issuing licenses under the license contract. This should correspond to the common name in the SSL certificate

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Specification of the liability you grant for each license issuing

safekeepingPeriod.title: Safekeeping Period (Years)
safekeepingPeriod.description: The number of years you will keep all documents you inspected as part of the license issuing

sslCertificate.title: SSL-Certificate (PKCS#12 encoded as Hex encrypted with an empty password or PEM-encoded certificate chain)
sslCertificate.description: TODO: Proper description when SSL format has been decided on

sslPrivateKey.title: SSL private key (optional)
sslPrivateKey.description: TODO: Proper description when SSL format has been decided on

error.no_root_contract_selected: You need to specify under which root contract you want to create your license contract
error.no_issuer_address_selected: You need to choose which address to use for future license issuings
error.no_issuerName_entered: Please provide your or your organisation's name that matches the name on the SSL certificate
error.no_safekeepingPeriod_entered: Please specify, how long you keep purchase records
error.sslPrivateKey_does_not_match: The private key does not match the given certificate

waitForContractCreationMining.title: Waiting for contract creation to be mined

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: The license contract you want to sign

manualSignature.title: Signature
manualSignature.description: The digital signature of the certificate text created using the private key of the SSL certificate you provided when creating the license contract

privateKey.title: Private SSL key
privateKey.description: The private key for the SSL certificate you provided when creating the license contract. The key will never be transmitted anywhere but only be used to generate the signature.

error.alreadySigned: This license contract has already been signed
error.privateKey_empty: Private key must not be empty
error.signature_verification_data_not_loaded_y: Data necessary to verify the signature not loaded from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment and try again
error.privateKey_verification_data_not_loaded_: Data necessary to generate the signature not loaded from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment and try again

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: Choose the license contract under which to issue the license

licenseTemplate.title: Template
licenseTemplate.description: If you are issuing one of the licenses in this list, use the pre-defined code and description

code.title: Code
code.description: A unique code for the type of license to be issued

description.title: Description
description.description: A human readable description of the license to be issued

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Number of licenses to be issued

auditTime.title: Audit date
auditTime.description: The date at which you performed the license audit

auditRemark.title: Audit remark
auditRemark.description: A free text remark you want to add regarding the audit

initialOwnerAddress.title: Initial owner address
initialOwnerAddress.description: The Ethereum address of the initial owner of the licenses

initialOwnerName.title: Initial owner name
initialOwnerName.description: The name of the initial owner of the licenses

fee.title: Issuance fee
fee.description: The fee that will be paid to LOB for issuing the license

error.licenseContract_not_valid: You have not selected a license contract
error.code_empty: Please enter a code for the license type
error.description_empty: Please enter a description of the license type
error.amount_empty: Please specify how many licenses to issue
error.amount_zero: You need to issue at least one license
error.auditTime_empty: You need to specify when you performed the audit
error.auditTime_in_future: The audit cannot be in the future since it has to already been performed
error.initialOwnerAddress_not_valid: This is not a valid Ethereum address
error.initialOwnerName_empty: Please specify the name of the person or organisation that will initally receive the licenses
error.fee_not_fetched: The issuance fee has not been fetched from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment for the value to update and try again
